verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3753><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the seven seals, <S%G4973><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> with a voice <S%G5456><s%> of thunder, <S%G1027><s%> "Come <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see! <S%G991><s%>"

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1492><s%> <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> horse, <S%G2462><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> who sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> a bow. <S%G5115><s%> <S%G2532><s%> A crown <S%G4735><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he came forth <S%G1831><s%> conquering, <S%G3528><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> conquer. <S%G3528><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> he opened <S%G455><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> living creature <S%G2226><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Come! <S%G2064><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> came forth, <S%G1831><s%> a red <S%G4450><s%> horse. <S%G2462><s%> <S%G2532><s%> To him <S%G846><s%> who sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> power to take <S%G2983><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should kill <S%G4969><s%> one another. <S%G240><s%> <S%G2532><s%> There was given <S%G1325><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> sword. <S%G3162><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> he opened <S%G455><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> living creature <S%G2226><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Come <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see! <S%G991><s%>" And <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G1492><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> a black <S%G3189><s%> horse, <S%G2462><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> who sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> a balance <S%G2218><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "A choenix <S%G5518><s%> of wheat <S%G4621><s%> for a denarius, <S%G1220><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> choenix <S%G5518><s%> of barley <S%G2915><s%> for a denarius! <S%G1220><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Don't <S%G3361><s%> damage <S%G91><s%> the oil <S%G1637><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the wine! <S%G3631><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> he opened <S%G455><s%> the fourth <S%G5067><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the <S%G5456><s%> fourth <S%G5067><s%> living creature <S%G2226><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Come <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see! <S%G991><s%>"

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1492><s%> <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> a pale <S%G5515><s%> horse, <S%G2462><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1883><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> his name <S%G3686><s%> was Death. <S%G2288><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Hades <S%G86><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> one fourth <S%G5067><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the sword, <S%G4501><s%> <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> famine, <S%G3042><s%> <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the wild animals <S%G2342><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> he opened <S%G455><s%> the fifth <S%G3991><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> underneath <S%G5270><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%> the souls <S%G5590><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who had been killed <S%G4969><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the Word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of the Lamb which <S%G3739><s%> they had. <S%G2192><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "How <S%G2193><s%> long, <S%G4219><s%> Master, <S%G1203><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> true, <S%G228><s%> until <S%G3756><s%> you <S%G2919><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> avenge <S%G1556><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> on <S%G575><s%> those who dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth? <S%G1093><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> A long white <S%G3022><s%> robe <S%G4749><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to each of them. <S%G1538><s%> <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G846><s%> were told <S%G4483><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should rest <S%G373><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> for a <S%G3398><s%> while, <S%G5550><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> their <S%G846><s%> fellow servants <S%G4889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> who would <S%G3195><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> be killed <S%G615><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> they <S%G846><s%> were, <S%G3195><s%> should complete their course. <S%G4137><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he opened <S%G455><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake. <S%G4578><s%> <S%G2532><s%> The sun <S%G2246><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> black <S%G3189><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> sackcloth <S%G4526><s%> made of hair, <S%G5155><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the whole moon <S%G4582><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> blood. <S%G129><s%>

The stars <S%G792><s%> of the sky fell <S%G4098><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> like a fig tree <S%G4808><s%> dropping its unripe figs <S%G3653><s%> when it is shaken <S%G4579><s%> by a great wind. <S%G417><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The sky <S%G3772><s%> was removed <S%G673><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a scroll <S%G975><s%> when it is rolled <S%G1507><s%> up. <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> island <S%G3520><s%> were moved <S%G2795><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> places. <S%G5117><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the princes, <S%G3175><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the commanding officers, <S%G5506><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the rich, <S%G4145><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the strong, <S%G1415><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> slave <S%G1401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956><s%> free person, <S%G1658><s%> hid <S%G2928><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the caves <S%G4693><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the rocks <S%G4073><s%> of the mountains. <S%G3735><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They told <S%G3004><s%> the mountains <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the rocks, <S%G4073><s%> "Fall <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hide <S%G2928><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of him who sits <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of the Lamb, <S%G721><s%>

for <S%G3754><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> has come; <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to stand? <S%G2476><s%>"
